caption: Just acceptable, you can tell they dont try too hard to make a good first impression.
Delish

This restaurant is my number one site.  Of all restaurants I know I love it most. I always suggests to my friends to go to visit this place. everytime  I feel like having a good dinner, this restaurant comes straightaway to my mind. exeptionalgorgeous and varied  food and a rich cuisine.great staff members, and pleasant ambience. Also, the tariff is fair. I suggest this place with great pleasure.
This restaurant has extraordinary service as well as tasty meals. My favourite place around here. The food arrived rapidly and the prices are inexpensive. Recommended.
tasty food, very good choice of cocktails, nice service, what else you could wish for during these crazy times? Best chill place in the neighborhood hands down.

I stopped in one evening for takeout and ordered the panang curry seafood combination and thai iced tea. The dish was flavorful, colorful and had the right amount of spice. I was on an errand, with a long train ride back and the staff made sure to pack my food securely. While I waited, everyone was so friendly, they even let me sample an upcoming menu item. There is outdoor seating due to covid or you can order takeout/ delivery. The location is conveniently nestled among other great restaurants but surely stands out. Looking forward to eating here again 😋
This place simply knows how to serve their clients. Constantly with a very welcoming approach. The food is fairly priced, always tasty and clean.
Great service and the food is amazing. Glow jack is highly recommended
The place is nice and broad, the menu was delicious and the rates were very fair. quick, efficient service and very affable staff. Will definitely recommend this restaurant.
Excellent

Thought this place would be good because of all the good reviews on google but I ordered take out from here and I was so disappointed! I ordered The red curry and found a piece of a silver Brillo pad in there. I also ordered the mango sticky rice and the the mango they put on top was rotten! It had brown spots inside and out, what’s crazy is that they didn’t even try to hide the fact that their mango was rotten. Disgusting place. Wish I could get my money back!
I am ready to give another chance after my first -not so great- experience.
This place is amazing and broad, the menu was enchanting and the rates were very affordable. quick, efficient service and very amiable staff. I highly recommend this place.

Had the pad see ew for takeout a couple times, which was consistently delicious, so decided to try eating in for Valentine's Day. No tables were available, which was to be expected, but they were kind enough to seat us at the bar. The place was super busy for the holiday, but the staff were absolutely killing it. Food and drinks came quick and were delicious as always.  So glad to have such a great Thai option in the neighborhood, and I'm looking forward to coming back on a less busy day to sample some of their interesting cocktails (which are, according to the menu, Bangkok-inspired and unique to NYC).
Great food and friendly staff! Perfect for takeout or eating in. Cozy and intimate inside.
Best Thai in Brooklyn!
Really nice drinks here...loved it...
The best Thai food in NY
Best Thai food with drinks to match in Bayridge

Food was great - flavorful and tasty. I usually always have Pad Thai but I tried the Pad Kee Mow and I'm going to be ordering that at all Thai restaurants going forward. The cocktails were very refreshing - the lychee ones and the guava-coconut one in particular were delicious! One star off because the menu card, the flowerpot stand next to the tables and some of the utensils were a bit unclean. If that's fixed, this would be a nice and cozy place to eat at.

Small but great little spot. Very cool cocktail menu. Food is delicious and a lot of the dishes are customizable (pick your protein). Duck is especially good.  Friendly service and stylish decor, but could use some repairs (duct tape on a booth, water dripping from the bathroom ceiling in 2 spots). Other than that it's lovely all around!

I am a server. And feel it’s not nice if the customer tried to say something too fake and made it up for some purpose!  I apologize if anything or whoever make you feel uncomfortable but at least come and tell me what it happens I will listen by appreciate and sorry by that. Uhh one more thing a lot of families always come here for lunch and dinner and they all got happy here so what you talked about make out in the restaurant it’s so much different between good buy kiss and make out. Wish you understand, Thanks!

Walked in the place was empty. Sat down, the table was sticky. Then, man was sleeping on the table. He woke up and washed his face at the bar. And then made out with the server. Then they both went outside to smoke and she came back alone. Horrible experience, and not a place for family. The food was okay but extremely oily. Will never go there again.
Not authentic pad thai. The food is 15mins late compared to the pick-up time. Will not go back
Amazing! Very chill atmosphere, delicious food...you must try the massaman
Their thaigeritas are terrific! best Thai margaritas and spicy! I love their food too! Great place in Bay Ridge
Great for family dinners. The food was reasonably priced and our server was very sweet. If you're in Bay Ridge, be sure and check it out!
Thai rice is amazing.  Curry puffs are amazing.  Drinks are sooooooo good! Definitely reccomend for everyone! Dope staff
Had an excellent dinner here at Glow Thai. Simply the BEST curry I have ever had. The drunk gummy bear was delicious as well. If Im ever in Brooklyn again I will be back.
So delicious
Absolutely love this place!!!

Really enjoyed a simple meal at Glow. Tom ka with tofu, green mango salad, and pad thai. The tofu in the tom ka was quite good, soft but not mushy or grainy. The broth was lovely if perhaps a little on the sweet side. Green mango salad was nothing to rave about but the spice level was spot on for my tastes. Pad thai was solid and had a wonderful roasty toasty undertone to it. A pot of jasmine rea complimented the meal well.
Love coming here and enjoying the company of nadya!! She makes some mixology drinks at perfection level

I used to go to Glow Thai Rwligiously years ago when they cared more and put more effort into their food I guess. I should’ve paid attention to the last reviewS I read. My noodles were drenched in oil. They sent 3 complimentary curry puffs I believe. RAW DOUGH. And drenched in oil as well. So disappointed, I was giving them a last chance but this is def the LAST time Im giving them business.
(Translated by Google) The best Pad Thai I've tasted so far! Very friendly and friendly staff.  (Original) El mejor Pad Thai que he probado hasta el momento! El personal muy familiar y amable.
Wonderful
username: Charles ward hair / make up artist

caption: Awesome little spot

Small, cozy and intimate. Good for couples and small groups 6 max. Good service and casual atmosphere. Was not too crowded on the weekday that we visited not sure how the weekend crows is. The food was very good my group raved about the wings and we all had different versions of the fried rice.
I've ordered multiple times and it's always delicious.

GlowThai is a personal favorite of mine. Its small and intimate, the decor is really nice, and theres a wonderful view of the busy bay ridge streets. So far, everything Ive tried is a hit, no misses at all. The pineapple fried rice is by far my favorite dish here, after that would be the delicious tiger tear. The appetizers and drinks are also excellent, I would recommend the curry puffs, octopus rings (basically thai calamari) and the shrimp rolls. Also, please do yourself a favor and trest yourself to the Gummy Bear drink, especially if you have a sweet tooth and love gummy bears.
Great Drinks..All fresh ingredients and they take there time to make your drink perfect🍸🍸
Glow consistently delivers excellent service and delicious food. A nice cozy intimate Thai restaurant in the heart Bay Ridge that doesn't disappoint.
Decent food. Drinks looked cool with the dry ice but not worth the price.

Spontaneously decided to have Thai for dinner last night and remembered this spot actually being closed. (read "Our Story In Their Menu"). To then drive by with my husband and see it open.  Glow definitely surpassed any expectation I thought I had. Especially the drinks made by a true professional, kind and friendly bartender who goes by Red.... AMAZING!!  "Glowmantic⚘🌷⚘" What a Sexy & Satisfying drink.  The food was also very good. The spice just perfect the heat spot on.  We're definitely going again.
Food was phenomenal, service and ambience and the owner came over and spoke to us and was fantastic. Will be back many times!!
(Translated by Google) Yummoooo !! $$ !!  (Original) Yummoooo!!$$!!
(Translated by Google) CHEXELLENT  (Original) CHEXELLENT
I love it there,  it's my home away from home

Glow Thai is a great little gem with friendly staff and excellent food. They also use liquid nitrogen in their specialty drinks for a presentation bonus! Pro Tip: Their gummy bear cocktail can be served in bowl form to be shared amongst a few people.  Well worth it if you think you might order more than two or three of the smaller version.

Been coming here for many years. The cocktails are one of a kind. I’ve never had one quite like these anywhere else. And it’s a treat to watch them make them at the bar! It’s a small place so it gets crowded quickly, but I’ve never had a problem with seating. Food is good, servers are friendly.
Great meal, especially chicken Pad Thai! Perfect drinks! Cool staff!
Great place to eat

Quick service and clean environment. Staff is very nice and I ordered a plate to go . It takes five minutes and while you wait they offer a cup of ice water and a seat at the bar . Over all very nice place
Descent food. I'm sure there are better Thai restaurants but it was good enough and the price was not bad. Friendly staff.
Amazing cocktails with delicious food to accompany the evening.
The food was very good. The service was fine.
Really good thai food.  Recommend the Tikki Masala
Love the food here , just hate that they open to 1:30 in the afternoon
Great drinks, tasty and strong. The tamarind marinated skirt steak was amazing and you got a lot for the price. Dark, intimate place, modern decor. Good for date night.
Best mistake my friend made when she purchased it on Groupon. The Crispy Squid Appetizer in Thai sauce was amazing. Also had the Sautéed Shrimp with vegetables in Sweet Chile Sauce-Great!
Great place for a good cocktail.
Great atmosphere, food & drinks. Also quick delivery & food travels well when you're too lazy to go out.

I am beyond disappointed in the service of this restaurant. Its really gone down hill over the years.  No one answers the phone.  let it ring for 10 minutes once. the quality of food has also diminished. Time to find a new place!
Great food and drinks. Happy hour is a must.
Food is very delicious and the service is great. Decor is pretty cool.

We actually stumbled upon this place by accident as the original restaurant we had planned to visit was closed that night. If you're looking for a place with Thai food with a great ambiance this is the place to go. The service was wonderful and surprisingly not pricey, my party of 3 ordered 3 apps, 3 entrées, and 3 alcoholic drinks for less than 90 bucks!
The food here is decent, not the best thai food but if you're in the neighborhood.. The waiting staff is very courteous. Decor is nice. Not a bad place to bring a date.

It's good for couples to stay. Nice small Thai food restaurant. Price is reasonable, but my family said the size is not Brooklyn size(it's kind of small , but it's good since it have to be taste good to want more) I believe it is very nice. And yelp got couple . Also takeout and delivery is available.

Very good food and drinks, but the service is usually pretty bad. Lots of nice exposed brick inside and perfect lighting. I always want to like this place more, but lackluster service often spoils the experience.
Chic lounge with delicious and flavorful Thai dishes. Relatively affordable too!!!
Chill atmosphere , great drinks & authentic Thai food 👍🏻

Glow Thai is the best restaurant there is around! The drinks are amazing & the food is absolutely the best Thai food around! The staff & owner Anthony are the kindest people around! Me and my two girls from queens always come here at least twice a week because it is that good! If you want a good atmosphere where you feel at home with good food and cocktails, definitely come here!!!! Pad Kee Mow is amazing with chicken and the massaman curry is our fave as well!!!! When we walk in the waitresses know exactly what cocktail we'd are going to get which is the drunken gummy bear!!!!! Amazing and merry Christmas !!!!
Great food, had so much fun, Our go to spot in Bay Ridge Brooklyn ;-)
Awesome local spot with great Thai food and interesting cocktails. Atmosphere is good for date nite or girls night out. I've ordered delivery here a few times and it's also fast and fresh!
Love the food, decor, staff and drinks.   I recommend the Sausage and Pad Thai.  The only time I really enjoy going to Bay Ridge if to eat at Glow Thai.
Place was average, maybe I just don't like Thai food. I would say give this place a shot.

I was there 2 times and always was something wrong... unfresh (for example their special "fresh calamari") which we're old and stinky! Also their waitress every time drop something or poured something. Last time it was hot soup on my baby stroller with my baby in!
Ordered delivery... couldn't hear the lady... called me up 40 minutes later said something about a delivery? Then the food never showed up. Waste of time..
My fave Thai place in Bay Ridge. Owner is from Thailand so food is legit. Love the salmon panang. Order it extra, extra spicy if you can handle it.

Authentic Thai food @ decent quality. There is no optional level of "hotness" though. The default "hoy & spicy" of the food was damped down (to attract more american customers, I guess). Service was average. The ambience interesting but very dark. The waitresses dress very *relaxed*. I guess because it was dark, they didnt care. Overall good experience .

the food is good but their Curry Puffs are worth a trip - these mouthfuls of delight come with a great cucumber dipping sauce - I order them all the time and sometimes get 3 orders to meet the delivery spend - they are good nuked the next day but not as great as they are fresh

It's small, but damn is it good. I got the curry and my friend got the ground pork over rice entree. We also split an order of wings. Everything was so good we actually finished it without having any leftovers. Which is too bad since I wanted seconds. I'll definitely be coming back here.
Consistently good in and for delivery
Inexpensive good Thai food in Bay Ridge.  The restaurant has a great atmosphere.  Cool decor.  The food is very tasty. The service can be a bit slow.  But overall worth the wait.

Awful. I've had to send something back each time I've been there. When you send something back you need to look at the check to make sure they still don't charge you for it. When I first went in they didn't have knives - I had to run to the Chinese place across the street for a plastic knife. They give your water with no ice.  The food is meh. Pad Thai is a big mush, probably some of the worst I've had in Brooklyn. Papaya salad tasted like fish. They're usually out of the specials and desserts. Curry puffs are probably the best thing on the menu, but nothing to write home about.  They have soggy wood tables and don't wipe down the big communal cushioned bench against the wall unless requested, even if it is visibly dirty.  If you have the Groupon then go ahead but be prepared for the worst sit down restaurant in Bay Ridge. Sad really, the location is known for being a cursed spot and I can't see it being open much longer with the sparse amount of business in it nightly.

Restaurant is very pretty with modern black lacquer  tables and Thai decorations. There is a huge picture of a gold Buddha on the wall. Small area with a few seats. Would be good to hold a small party. Prices are good and there is a lunch special for $8. Closed on WED!!!  Today was a tasting and I was served Curry Puffs and Pad Thai Chicken. The curry wasn't strong and the puff was very crispy. Along with that came a dipping sauce of vinegar with cucumber and sweet onion-this is good! Next was Pad Thai, the noodles were overcooked but there was plenty of meat and bean sprouts  in a gingery peanut butter sauce-that was ok. The owner doesn't understand English but she can cook a nice meal. People in the area enjoy the place and eat here often. It has A rating and we also came while the Health Inspector was there. One downfall-there is an area before the kitchen which is used as an office and playing area for the children of the owner.

Went for a tasting that they advertised but when we got there they did not know anything about it but were happy to accommodate us. After a wait of not knowing what was happening, the waitress (we soon found out was the owner) said we would be served soon.  For the tasting we received some Curry Puffs and Pad Thai Chicken, the Puffs were very tasty with just the right amount of curry, the Pad Thai was a bit soft for my taste.  The place is small can only sit about 20 or so and has a small bar. The decor was nice with brick walls and some nice paintings hanging. The bathrooms were also clean.  I would go again for a full meal if I was in the area again.
Get food for the money, fresh, flavorful, authentic
This is our favorite Thai place. The owner is very friendly. And the food is fantastic.

About time! A super nice Bay Ridge gem like Glow hits my hood.  The food was good and the service promt! I like the place more for a dating night out but just had lunch with my friend which costs a few bucks less. Check it out when you are in town!
